| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Branch        | master for features and deprecations
| Bug fix?      | yes/no
| New feature?  | yes/no
| BC breaks?    | yes/no
| Deprecations? | yes/no
| Tests pass?   | yes/no
| Documented?   | yes/no
| Fixed tickets | comma-separated list of tickets fixed by the PR, if any
